title: Allow apps to be hidden/visible in the store like the old dashboard
body: Allow apps to be hidden/visible in the store without having to go through the whole update process.  Back to how it was on the old dashboard would be ideal, just a simple link to toggle between visible and hidden.

comments.body: Now it's not clear when an app is visible in the store. You must open the application details in order to find out. Make it more clear. A textblock maybe with colors for visible/hidden?
